Your signature does look different compared to mine. Mine have  
tokubetsu-=
hozon papers from the NBTHK, which would indicate high  
quality. It seems =
the fittings museum was going to buy these  
fuchi-kashira, but went bust b=
efore they could. I do not know this  
artisan, but he does seem to have a =
high reputation. Your picture only  
shows the signature, what does the res=
t look like?

Gordon
